warning.firstContent: The site you are visiting is not yet fully completed. It may contain errors, but these will be fixed before September 9, 2024 (Club opening date).
warning.secondContent: If you have any questions, please contact us at the number provided at the bottom of the page.

team.title: Our team
team.subTitle: In our club, we have two exceptional coaches who will help you progress to a level you never imagined possible.

schedule.title: Our Hours
schedule.subTitle: Wrestling and grappling classes alternate each week.

rates.title: Rates
rates.subTitle: Monthly subscription
rates.firstContent: Payments are made in cash directly at the club. The amount must be paid between the 1st and the 9th day of the current month.
rates.secondContent: A free trial class is available for both disciplines.

errorElement.title: Error 404
errorElement.content: The page you are trying to find could not be found.
